resources.string: Iodo alkanes on reacting with silver nitrite give nitro compounds. This method will not give good yield for nitro benzene. This method will not give good yield for nitro benzene. But all the aliphatic nitro compounds can be prepared by this method. For example iodoethane on treating with silver nitrate gives nitro ethane.
If there are multiple contributors separate them with commas
